snippet: Lawyers for an ad-hoc student group have asked that a special committee be formed to press the students’ claims and ensure their participation in bankruptcy proceedings that will affect their futures.
abstract: Lawyers for students seeking loan forgiveness or programs to help them with education and job placement after collapse of Corinthian Colleges ask that special committee be formed to press students’ claims and ensure their participation in bankruptcy proceedings.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for an ad-hoc student group have asked that a special committee be formed to press the students’ claims and ensure their participation in bankruptcy proceedings that will affect their futures.

headline.main: Former Students Seek to Shape Corinthian Colleges Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: Former Students Seek to Shape Corinthian Colleges Bankruptcy
